sentences.sentence: SEE ALSO: New Tyrannosaur Had More Teeth Than T. rex.
sentences.translation: 比霸王龙拥有更多牙齿的新生代。

sentences.sentence: If so, he, she or it would not be the only new tyrannosaur in the news at the moment.
sentences.translation: 如果事实真如此，他，她或者它，将不会是现在新闻中报道的唯一新霸王龙。

sentences.sentence: Here at Discovery News we recently reported on the incredible differences between Tyrannosaur toddlers and their parents.
sentences.translation: 我们最近就在《发现新闻》上报道了幼年暴龙与他们父母之间令人难以置信的差异。
